      • getFxProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyProperty<T> getFxProperty()
        Gets the the JavaFX property from the underlying bean (if available). If not available, an IllegalStateException is thrown.
        Returns:
        the JavaFX property, accessed via the propery-getter
